name: SWAP
body:
SWAP (Star Wars Analyzer & Parser) is a new open-source *Star Wars: The Old Republic* combat log parser written in the [Python programming language](http://python.org).

### [Download SWAP v0.8.4e (32-bit, Installer)](http://faultexception.com/swap/downloads/swap-v0.8.4e-setup.exe)
If you know what you're doing, look below for more options.

## Features
* **100% open-source:** You can delve into our code, change stuff, send it back to us, or fork it! (Note: SWAP server source-code not available yet.)
* **P2P raids:** SWAP doesn't synchronize raids using our central servers, instead we use [NAT traversal](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NAT_traversal) to establish a direct connection to one of the raid members. If that's not possible we use our servers as a relay to that raid member.
* **Low CPU footprint:** Lower idle parsing CPU usage than MOX parser.
* **Overlays:** Our overlays are always on top, have no title bar, can be dragged, clicked and resized, all without losing focus on the game. You can even enable "Click-through Overlays"

## Downloads
|     | OS   | Version   | Link   | Notes |
| --- | ---- | --------- | ------ | ----- |
| ![icon](http://faultexception.com/swap/nsis-orange.png) | Windows 32-bit | v0.8.4e | [Installer](http://faultexception.com/swap/downloads/swap-v0.8.4e-setup.exe) | Requires Administrator |
| ![icon](http://faultexception.com/swap/zip.png) | Windows 32-bit | v0.8.4e | [Zip Archive](http://faultexception.com/swap/downloads/swap-v0.8.4e.zip) | |
